predicate.note: Frames file for 'produce' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'make'

roleset.name: create

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: The plant will produce control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.
example.arg: control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.

example.name: passivized
example.text: The test and Learning Materials are both produced by the same company, Macmillan/McGraw-Hill.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: A contractor will produce vital equipment for the Army and Navy.

roleset.note: Avoid adjectival usages like "sugar producing nations"
